description.value:
Croatan Fetish (Fetish)

Creation Cost: 15 Gnosis

A relic bound with sacrifice-spirits and ancient memory.

Effect: As an action, choose one effect:

  • Cleanse: Instantly end one ongoing environmental corruption, curse, or spiritual blight in a 60-foot radius
  • Restore: Restore balance to a desecrated area, allowing Caern or Rite activity to function normally for 24 hours

After activation, the fetish becomes inert until the next full moon. Usable once per month.
